translation.en: Tumi. Tumi. Boitumelo!
Tumi, you're going to drown!
- No, we're not calling the police. -  Tumi, you're naked.
translation.es: - No llamaremos a la policía. - Estás desnuda, Tumi.

translation.en: What if those vultures in the media find out?
translation.es: ¿Y si los buitres de la prensa se enteran?

translation.en: We need to take her to the hospital.
translation.es: - Debemos llevarla al hospital. - Empezó de nuevo.

translation.en: I'm sure there's a perfectly logical explanation to all of this.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que hay una explicación para todo esto.

translation.en: - Oh, my goodness! - Relax, relax.
I swear this is not what it looks like. - -
translation.es: Juro que no es lo que parece.

translation.en: Wherever there's fun That's where you'll find me
translation.es: UNA SERIE ORIGINAL DE NETFLIX La boda

translation.en: Good morning, ladies and gents. This is your captain speaking.
translation.es: Buen día, damas y caballeros. Les habla su capitán.

translation.en: Welcome to our flight AB2709 from Cape Town to Johannesburg.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al vuelo AB2789 de Ciudad del Cabo a Johannesburgo.

translation.en: We're expecting some turbulence this morning,
so please keep your seatbelts fastened while the seatbelt lights are on.
translation.es: mantengan ajustados sus cinturones, cuando la luz esté encendida.

translation.en: This is the image of three idiots who forgot to check in online.
translation.es: Esta es la imagen de tres idiotas que olvidaron hacer el check-in online.

translation.en: - Are you okay, baby? - Mm- hmm.
She isn't.
You know I'd be holding your hand right now if I was sitting next to you.
translation.es: Sabes que estaría sosteniendo tu mano si estuviera a tu lado.

translation.en: Please, don't.
Would you two like to sit together?
- Oh, no, we’re fine. - If you wouldn't mind.
translation.es: No, está bien. Si no te molesta.

translation.en: We don't wanna inconvenience you.
Oh, I like the window.
Of course you do.
Yeah.
- Sorry. There we go. -
- You see, it worked out. - Baby.
I missed you.
This would have never happened on a flight to Mauritius.
translation.es: Esto jamás habría pasado en un vuelo a Mauricio.

translation.en: I mean, it could have,
but at least I’d be going on a solocation to Mauritius, instead of--
translation.es: pero al menos estaría rumbo a unas vacaciones sola a Mauricio en vez de…

translation.en: - Jo'burg? - What?
Are you also spending your Christmas in Jo’burg?
Oh, yeah, um,
home. My sister’s getting married.
translation.es: En casa, se casa mi hermana.

translation.en: - - Oh, my gosh!
We’re getting married next year.
translation.es: Nos casaremos el año que viene.

translation.en: His family wants us to get married in Jo’burg and I'm like,
translation.es: Su familia quiere que nos casemos en Johannesburgo,

translation.en: nobody gets married in Joburg. It's been like--
translation.es: pero nadie se casa en Johannesburgo… Hace…

translation.en: Sorry, sister.
- Do you mind if…? She’s cold. - So?
She’s cold. So do you mind…
If I ever fall in love, shoot me.
translation.es: Si alguna vez me enamoro, dispárenme.

translation.en: You know we're in Jo'burg when the escalators aren't working.
translation.es: Sabes que estás en Johannesburgo porque las escaleras no funcionan.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness!
It's probably loadshedding.
I agree.
- There we are. - But it's fine, we're here. We made it.
translation.es: Pero, está bien, llegamos. Lo logramos.

translation.en: Yes. Yes.
- Selfie? Selfie, baby? - Of course!
Are you fucking kidding me?
Wait, wait, wait baby. Let's do nosies.
- Nosies. - Nosies.
- Did you get it? - Okay.
Come, let's go.
Oh! You always knew how to make friends.
ORLANDO PIRATES SUCKS!
Really?
The truth hurts.
Yeah. Just like how guys who drive Porsches,
translation.es: Sí, y los tipos que manejan Porsches

translation.en: - are always trying to overcompensate. - No one's complaining.
translation.es: siempre compensan algo. No me quejo.

translation.en: You know, I really shouldn’t have invited you to this wedding.
translation.es: No debería haberte invitado a esta boda.

translation.en: - I will leave you here, try me. - You won't.
translation.es: Por mí te dejo, créeme. No lo harías.

translation.en: I'm kidding!
T- money, T- Gwap, T- cash, T- baby!
- Whadda do, baby? - That's right!
Don’t make this awkward by saying something stupid like…
translation.es: No hagas las cosas incómodas diciendo algo como…

translation.en: I missed this.
Come, let's take a picture for the gram.
- For the gram? - Yeah, yeah, yeah.
How else are people going to know that I'm happy to see you?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va a saber la gente que estoy feliz de verte?

translation.en: - Ah! I can see we're still obsessed. - Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Gotta give the people what they want.
translation.es: Hay que darles lo que quieren.

translation.en: Hello, Beyonce, Jay- Zed. You're here to make out?
translation.es: Hola, Beyoncé y Jay-Z. ¿Están acá para besarse?

translation.en: Can't you see that this is for pickups only?
translation.es: ¿No ven que es solo para recoger gente?

translation.en: If you want to kiss each other, go away.
Or would you rather get a parking ticket?
- Oh, okay. No! No! - No! No! We're leaving.
- Lemme get the bags. - Yes, leave.
translation.es: - Déjeme tomar la maleta. - Sí, váyanse. Muévanse.

translation.en: You look so beautiful!
- Oh, my word! - Wow!
You look absolutely amazing.
Looks like someone didn’t stick to the Team Bride diet.
translation.es: Parece que alguien no cumplió con la dieta del Equipo Novia.

translation.en: Um, what diet? I am not going to eat my first meal at lunch time.
translation.es: ¿Qué dieta? No puedo empezar a comer al mediodía.

translation.en: December, babes.
Guys, it's called intermediate fasting for a reason, I mean Refiloe.
translation.es: Por algo se llama Ayuno intermediario.

translation.en: Please repeat that. Inter- what?
Intermediate fasting.
- You and your English. - It's intermittent.
translation.es: Tú y tu español. Es intermitente.

translation.en: Listen, only poor people fast, okay? I'm not poor today.
translation.es: Oye, solo los pobres hacen ayuno, ¿sí? Y hoy no soy pobre.

translation.en: No, no, poor people actually don't fast. They're actually hungry.
translation.es: No, no. De hecho, los pobres no ayunan. Tienen hambre.

translation.en: Guys, we're going to be on national TV. Trust me it's gonna be worth it.
translation.es: Chicas, vamos a salir en la televisión. Créanme, valdrá la pena.

translation.en: Am I-- Am I the only person who stuck to this diet?
translation.es: ¿Soy la única que cumplió con la dieta?

translation.en: Friend, as I said, it's the holidays!
Have a strawberry.
Take it to the top.
Okay, I'll see. Let me help you.
Breathe in.
I'm gonna need you to…
- Breathe in. Breathe in. -
How will you breathe, babe?
Uh, breathing is overrated.
Um, okay.
Um… Yeah, it's… It's not… her yet.
translation.es: Sí… No… No es ella todavía.

translation.en: I don't understand why Tumi didn't get here on time like the rest of us.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué Tumi no llegó puntual como nosotras.

translation.en: Ah, guys, let’s try on the Zulu outfits.
- The Zulu outfits sound like a vibe. - Yes, yes, yes!
The bride is ours
- We all agree - Say yeah
Knock, knock
I can't believe my sister is getting married on Christmas day.
translation.es: No puedo creer que mi hermana se case en Navidad.

translation.en: Yes, well, you don't go home anymore.
translation.es: Pues, ya no vienes de visita.

translation.en: How else were they going to get you to come home for Christmas?
translation.es: ¿De qué otra forma podrían hacerte venir para Navidad?

translation.en: Tell me one person who wants that.
translation.es: Nombra una persona que quiere eso.

translation.en: Hello? Am I invisible?
- Aw, you're so cute. - What?
- You missed me. - No! No! Whatever. No.
I did not. Don’t flatter yourself. No I didn't.
translation.es: No te extrañé. No te eches flores. No te extrañé.

translation.en: It's… It's just that I can’t go home.
translation.es: Es que… no puedo ir a casa.

translation.en: My father will be there, and all he ever does is talk about mom,
translation.es: Mi padre estará allí y lo único que hace es hablar de mamá

translation.en: and it makes him sad, Which makes everyone feel worse. So, yeah.
translation.es: y me pone triste, lo cual hace que todos se sientan peor.

translation.en: Well, good thing is, you get to be my date.
translation.es: Pues, lo bueno es que eres mi cita.

translation.en: And save me from this three- day wedding saga.
translation.es: Y me salvarás de esta saga de tres días.

translation.en: You know what, I am glad my family’s grief is working out for you.
translation.es: Me alegra que mi duelo familiar te sirva a ti.

translation.en: So I’m all set for the traditional wedding tomorrow,
translation.es: Estoy listo para la boda tradicional mañana,

translation.en: but I might be a bit late for the white wedding on Christmas Day.
translation.es: pero puede que llegue un poco tarde para la boda blanca de Navidad.

translation.en: - Oh. - I've got a thing.
translation.es: para la boda blanca de Navidad. Tengo algo.

translation.en: Girls aren’t things, Khaya.
No, it’s not a girl.
It's always a girl with him.
translation.es: Siempre es una chica con él.

translation.en: Okay, fine, fine, you know what, I'll tell you if you don't make the sound.
translation.es: Bien, de acuerdo, te lo diré, si no haces el sonido.

translation.en: - What sound? - You know what sound I'm talking about.
translation.es: ¿Qué sonido? Sabes de qué sonido hablo.

translation.en: I'm not going to fall into this. Okay, you know what, fine, I'll tell you.
translation.es: No me harás caer. Está bien, te lo diré.

translation.en: So on Christmas day, I dress up as Father Christmas
translation.es: El día de Navidad, me disfrazo de Papá Noel

translation.en: and I go to a local home and hand out presents to the kids.
translation.es: y voy a un orfanato y entrego regalos a los niños.

translation.en: - - Oh, man!
Oh, you’re so predictable. I should have known.
translation.es: Eres tan predecible, debería haberlo sabido.

translation.en: Oh, man, I walked right into that one. Okay, fine. Are you done?
translation.es: Dios, caí en la trampa. - Bien, ¿terminaste? - Sí.

translation.en: - Are you done? - Yeah.
Hey, look, you should come with me. No, come on. Come with me.
Tumi, you should see these kids, their faces.
translation.es: Tumi, tienes que ver a estos niños, sus rostros.

translation.en: They will melt your stone- cold, dead heart.
translation.es: Te derretirán ese corazón de piedra.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Yeah!
Will they melt it enough to help me with my maid of honor speech?
translation.es: ¿Lo derretirán lo suficiente que me ayudarán con mi discurso de dama de honor?

translation.en: - Beauty trusted you to write something? - Right?
translation.es: - ¿Beauty te pidió que escribieras algo? - Sí.

translation.en: - You! - Yeah.
I don’t even know what to say.
Help me?
- With what? - The speech.
- No! No! - Please.
No! No, don't even do that.
Don't even look at me like that. I'm not helping you.
translation.es: No me mires así, no te ayudaré.

translation.en: This is not second year. No!
You get to do your own homework. I'm not helping you.
translation.es: Haces sola tu tarea. No te ayudaré.

translation.en: - Come on. - I'm not!
- Look at that smile. - I'm not smiling.
That's the I will help you smile.
- I'm not smiling.  - Thank you in advance, man.
translation.es: No estoy sonriendo. Gracias por adelantado, amigo.

translation.en: Whatever.
Okay!
- Hey! - Hi.
Hello.
Look at this line, does this line look straight to you?
translation.es: Mira esta línea. ¿Te parece que está recta?

translation.en: Aha! Is there anything that's ever straight with you, darling?
translation.es: Ajá, ¿hay algo recto en tu vida, cariño?

translation.en: You finally decided to grace us your wretched- ass presence.
translation.es: Finalmente decidiste honrarnos con tu inmunda presencia.

translation.en: Ah, Khaya. Still cute.
But you are still Xhosa.
Bokang. Still funny.
Boitumelo!
- -  Aunty!
- How are you? - You finally found a man!
I thought we were going to have to slaughter a white chicken for you!
translation.es: ¡Pensé que íbamos a tener que matar una gallina blanca por ti!

translation.en: No, this is my friend.
Khaya, this is my mother’s older sister.
translation.es: Khaya, ella es la hermana mayor de mi madre.

translation.en: - Aunty Moipone. - Aunt?
I was already thinking about the bride price,
translation.es: Ya estaba pensando en la dote

translation.en: and how I would bring all the cows I have.
translation.es: y cómo traer todas las vacas que tengo.

translation.en: And that's what we call the Khaya effect.
translation.es: Esto es lo que llamamos Efecto Khaya.

translation.en: Is Tumi going to come and greet me,
or is she going to keep hiding in the house?
translation.es: o seguirá escondiéndose en la casa?

translation.en: Yeah, I got you. Mom.
Okay.
- Hi, girl! - Hey!
Is your friend angry?
Yo! But it's not as bad as last Christmas.
translation.es: Sí, pero no tanto como la Navidad pasada.

translation.en: What happened last Christmas?
You would have known if you were here.
translation.es: Lo sabrías si hubieras estado aquí.

translation.en: All you need to know about my relationship with my mother,
translation.es: Lo único que hay que saber sobre mi relación con mi madre

translation.en: is that until I was twelve, I called my grandmother Mom
translation.es: es que, hasta que tuve 12 años, llamé mamá a mi abuela

translation.en: and my mother Big Sis, Dineo.
translation.es: y a mi madre Hermana Dineo.

translation.en: Hi, ma.
Please, don't ruin this for your sister.
translation.es: Por favor, no arruines las cosas a tu hermana.

translation.en: Oh, lovely to see you, mother.
- Khaya. Is that you? - Yes, mom.
How is your family doing?
Yes, mom, they are well, thank you.
Thank you.
Oh, this is aunt Grace.
She's the youngest of the four.
translation.es: La más joven de las cuatro.

translation.en: The youngest, the sexiest, the most gorgeous.
translation.es: La más joven, la más sexy y maravillosa.

translation.en: You go, girl.
Khaya, can you help me take these things to the car?
translation.es: Khaya, ¿me ayudas a llevar esto al auto?

translation.en: - Okay. - No! He's too young for you.
translation.es: - Sí… - No, no. Es demasiado joven para ti.

translation.en: Well, I still would…
- Tumi? - Mmm.
Please don’t kill each other before the wedding.
translation.es: No se maten entre sí antes de la boda.

translation.en: So, uh…
What's with the Extreme Makeover Home Edition?
translation.es: ¿Qué es esta transformación total de la casa?

translation.en: When the Twalas arrive here tomorrow,
they need to find everything perfect.
Did you win the lottery?
No. The bride price is used for such things.
translation.es: No. La dote se usa para estas cosas.

translation.en: The bride price money? For renovating your house?
translation.es: ¿El dinero de la dote? ¿Para renovaciones en tu casa?

translation.en: What have you contributed?
And this is where I shut up.
translation.es: Y aquí es donde cierro la boca.

translation.en: You know what?
This wedding is very important, Tumi.
I wonder how your Jesus feels about Beauty hijacking His birthday?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se sentirá tu Jesús si Beauty se apropiase de su cumpleaños?

translation.en: My Jesus will be happy to see Beauty happy.
translation.es: Mi Jesús estará feliz de ver feliz a Beauty.

translation.en: The fittings went very quickly I see.
translation.es: La prueba de vestidos fue rápida por lo que veo.

translation.en: Shit.
You forgot about the fittings?
Yes. No!
I just thought I would come by and greet you first.
translation.es: Solo quise venir a saludarte antes

translation.en: And now that I’ve seen you…
translation.es: y ahora que ya te vi…

translation.en: Bye!
Welcome, Minister Twala, Mrs. Twala.
Ah, thank you. Thank you. It's good to be here.
translation.es: Gracias, gracias. Un gusto estar aquí.

translation.en: Yeah.
Mm- mm! This isn’t champagne.
It’s an excellent MCC.
- MCC? - Yes.
What kind of Mickey Mouse operation are you conducting here?
This wedding is of national importance and is going to be televised.
translation.es: Esta boda es de importancia nacional y será televisada.

translation.en: Do you know what Black Twitter is like? Do you want to make me a hash tag?
translation.es: ¿Saben lo que es Black Twitter? ¿Quieren que sea hashtag?

translation.en: Please, don't.
Oh, this place is so beautiful.
Maybe we should renew our wedding vows here.
Hey, Beauty will kill you if you hijack our wedding, okay.
translation.es: Beauty te matará si te apropias de nuestra boda.

translation.en: Okay. That won't happen, okay.
We’re all under enough pressure.
Lydia, please don't.
Are those the non- alcoholic ones?
No.
You’re off to a great start.
So Mama, what do you think
of your grandson getting married in such a wonderful place?
translation.es: del maravilloso lugar donde se va a casar tu nieto?

translation.en: You’re very lucky.
The owners wouldn't ordinarily close down this place for a private function.
translation.es: Los dueños no suelen cerrar el lugar para un evento privado.

translation.en: I guess that comes with the perks of being a minister of distinction.
translation.es: Supongo que son los beneficios de ser un distinguido ministro.

translation.en: I can't believe that your father and I fought in the struggle
translation.es: No puedo creer que tu padre y yo hayamos sido parte de la lucha

translation.en: so that you could give your money to white people.
translation.es: para que tú les des dinero a los blancos.

translation.en: Granny.
What did she say?
She said that, um…
it's quite wonderful that we have the whole place to ourselves.
translation.es: …es maravilloso que tengamos el lugar entero.

translation.en: So, are you going to show us our rooms, or are we're going to sleep here?
translation.es: Entonces ¿nos mostrarán las habitaciones o vamos a dormir aquí?

translation.en: Of course, I’m sorry. Please come this way.
translation.es: Claro, lo siento. Vengan por aquí.

translation.en: I can't believe this family booked the whole place for Sbu.
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayan reservado todo el lugar

translation.en: He doesn't even have that many friends.
translation.es: para Sbu, ni siquiera tiene tantos amigos.

translation.en: Is it weird that-- I don't know,
I’m a bit jealous that they did all of this for Sbu because,
translation.es: me pone un poco celoso que hicieran todo esto por Sbu porque…

translation.en: I mean, this is Four Seasons hot--  Uh- huh! No, come on, again?
translation.es: Ngoba, es un Four Seasons… No, vamos, ¿de nuevo?

translation.en: No way! You always want to have sex.
translation.es: ¡De ninguna manera! Siempre quieres tener sexo.

translation.en: Yes, I’m ovulating.
Okay.
Actually, this needs me on my back, in missionary. It's better for conception.
translation.es: Perdón, así. El misionero es mejor para concebir.

translation.en: Do your thing, baby.
The phone…
- What? - Honey.
Sbu.
Sbu…
Hey, bro.
We've arrived and everything is good.
Yeah.
He wants me to go to him.
No, it's fine, I'm coming. I'll come to you.
Yeah, sharp!
Mm- mm! Baby, Sbu can wait.
Mm- mmm. But I need to--
Look…
I'm his brother and I'm the best man,
translation.es: Soy su hermano y además soy su padrino de boda.

translation.en: - and you know how that can be. - Of course.
translation.es: - Ya sabes cómo son estas cosas… - Claro.

translation.en: - Maybe I should come and help you then. - No!
No. No. No.
Look, you’re ovulating.
So, now relax
because you need to stay calm and bake.
- Okay. -  Just like a stove.
Put these on.
For your swimmers to get more freedom.
translation.es: Así tus nadadores están más libres.

translation.en: Right?
- To boost fertility. - Okay.
Is this not an old wives’ tale? Aren't wives usually right?
translation.es: - ¿No es un cuento de viejas? - Las viejas suelen tener razón.

translation.en: Aren’t I the most beautiful Zulu- Tswana bride you've ever seen?
translation.es: ¿No soy la novia zulú-tswana más bella que hayas visto jamás?

translation.en: Ah, my sister. Always so modest.
translation.es: Ah, mi hermana, siempre tan modesta.

translation.en: Oh! Who could ever compare?
- Oh, look at you. - You're late.
We thought your plane crashed and burned.
translation.es: Pensamos que tu avión se había estrellado e incendiado.

translation.en: Crashed?
Wow! You're going have to pray a little harder next time.
translation.es: Vaya, tendrán que rezar un poco más la próxima vez.

translation.en: Khaya.
Still looking like my future baby daddy.
translation.es: Aún pareces el futuro padre de mi hijo.

translation.en: Hold up, Miss Loose Panty. That's my date.
translation.es: Tranquila, Bombacha veloz, es mi cita.

translation.en: We said no plus ones.
- But you're my sister. - Yes, and as my sister,
translation.es: Pero eres mi hermana. Sí y por eso, deberías saberlo.

translation.en: you should know better.
translation.es: Sí y por eso, deberías saberlo.

translation.en: We don't have food for him. There's no space.
translation.es: No tenemos comida para él y no hay lugar.

translation.en: And yet you booked out the Four Seasons.
Okay, guys. If there's a problem then
translation.es: Chicas, si hay un problema, de veras…

translation.en: - I don't have to come. - No!
translation.es: - No tengo por qué ir. - No.

translation.en: He can’t spend Christmas by himself.
Come on, B.
He has no mother.
Did you get me my wedding present?
Of course.
Tell her.
- I left it in Cape Town though. - Well, I could save you the trip.
translation.es: Pero lo dejé en Ciudad del Cabo. Puedo ahorrarte el viaje.

translation.en: You see Sbu and I weren’t going to have a honeymoon because of the whole move to London
translation.es: Sbu y yo no íbamos a ir de luna de miel, por la mudanza a Londres y eso

translation.en: and how much that costs, you know the pound and stuff. So…
translation.es: y lo que cuesta en libras y eso, así que…

translation.en: So?
So, you can gift us your miles.
No. No. No. My miles are for Mauritius.
translation.es: No, no. Mis millas son para Mauricio.

translation.en: Oh, we love Mauritius.
You know had you arrived on time,
translation.es: Sabes que si hubieras llegado a tiempo,

translation.en: I could have found space for Khaya over here,
translation.es: podría haberle encontrado lugar a Khaya.

translation.en: but now you’re gonna have to sit with Mom.
translation.es: Pero ahora tendrás que sentarte con mamá.

translation.en: Well played, Beauty.
You know, I’ll give you my miles.
- Sister, you don't have to do that. - Anything for you.
translation.es: - No tienes que hacerlo… - Lo que sea por ti.

translation.en: Hurry up and get dressed, we have to leave for the next fitting.
translation.es: Ahora de prisa, vístete, tenemos la siguiente prueba.

translation.en: You're getting married, man.
A new job overseas,  you've done really well for yourself.
translation.es: Un nuevo trabajo en el exterior. Hiciste las cosas bien.

translation.en: Yeah! From engaged to getting married in three months.
translation.es: Sí. De comprometido a casado en tres meses.

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't think I'm rushing this?
- No. - No?
- No. You-- - Yeah?
- You're fine. I mean unless you… - Yeah?
Did you get her pregnant?  Are you getting married because she's pregnant?
Lydia will kill me if you had a kid first. You can't do that.
translation.es: Lydia me matará si tienes un hijo antes.

translation.en: - Come on! - We’re far from babies.
translation.es: - No no... - ¡Vamos! Estamos lejos de tener un bebé.

translation.en: You see with the London job, we couldn't wait to get married.
translation.es: Con el trabajo de Londres, no podíamos esperar a casarnos.

translation.en: - Plus Beauty really liked this place. - It is really pretty.
translation.es: Y a Beauty le encantaba este lugar.

translation.en: - Might as well. - Yeah, sharp.
translation.es: - Es genial. - Es bonito. Estarán bien.

translation.en: I mean, your love will take you through anything.
translation.es: Su amor los ayudará a superar cualquier cosa.

translation.en: You guys are okay.
- Sure. - Yeah.
Until like…
You even pray to God and say,
Take me, Lord. Take me first and throw me away.
translation.es: Llévame, Señor, llévame primero y descártame.

translation.en: I'm done.
Well, I just hope your best man speech is better than that, right?
translation.es: Espero que tu discurso de padrino de boda sea mejor.

translation.en: - Yeah, no, I'm kidding. - Oh.
translation.es: Sí, no, no hablo en serio.

translation.en: - I'm joking. - You're joking?
- Yeah. - You're joking?
Yeah. Marriage is great.
- I'm telling you. - Sure.
It's the best decision I've ever taken in my life.
translation.es: Es la mejor decisión que tomé en mi vida.

translation.en: - Sure? - Yeah.
Great! - Yeah. - Yeah.
- Sure? - Yeah.
- You look amazing! -  Fuck.
- You don't like it. - I love it.
It's so… breathtaking and stuff.
Also why do we need the three dresses?
Because it's three ceremonies.
translation.es: Porque son tres ceremonias. ¿No leíste el grupo?

translation.en: - Did you not read anything on the group? - I did. It's just…
translation.es: Porque son tres ceremonias. ¿No leíste el grupo? Sí, es solo que…

translation.en: in my mind,
I didn't think we'd be galivanting around Jo'burg for fittings.
translation.es: no creí que estaríamos paseando por Johannesburgo probándonos cosas.

translation.en: Well, Tumi, had you arrived earlier,
translation.es: Pues, Tumi, si hubieras llegado antes,

translation.en: we wouldn't have to squeeze everything into one day
translation.es: no hubiéramos tenido que hacerlo en un día y no estaríamos atrasadas.

translation.en: - and maybe we wouldn't be behind schedule. - Chill, okay.
translation.es: no hubiéramos tenido que hacerlo en un día y no estaríamos atrasadas. Calma, ¿sí?

translation.en: I'm sure Refiloe and Thando have things sorted at the venue.
translation.es: Seguro que Refiloe y Thando tienen todo listo en el salón.

translation.en: Tumi, you're the maid of honor.
translation.es: Tumi, eres la dama de honor.

translation.en: Yeah.
You look nice.
You mean amazing. Thank you.
Baby, how long do you think we're going to take here?
Poor Khaya. He's probably bored in the car.
translation.es: Pobre Khaya. Estará aburrido en el auto.

translation.en: - What's going on there? - Where?
You and Khaya.
Oh, come on. Are you guys done ignoring each other?
We weren’t. We were.
It’s been awkward for two years now.
translation.es: Hace dos años que es todo raro.

translation.en: I hope you know you’re not getting any younger.
- I would rather die happy. - You can’t be alone and happy.
translation.es: - Prefiero morir feliz. - No puedes ser feliz sola.

translation.en: How do you know? It's not like your family
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo sabes? No es que tu familia

translation.en: is the poster for happy endings in relationships.
translation.es: sea un ejemplo de relaciones que terminan bien.

translation.en: For real, listen.
Aunt Moipone's husband died when she was young.
translation.es: El esposo de la tía Moipone murió cuando ella era joven.

translation.en: Grace got dumped shortly after her bride price was agreed.
translation.es: Y a la tía Grace la abandonaron apenas acordada la dote.

translation.en: Your uncle is married to alcohol.
translation.es: Y a la tía Grace la abandonaron apenas acordada la dote. El tío está casado con el alcohol.

translation.en: I don't even want to talk about your mother.
translation.es: No quiero hablar de tu madre.

translation.en: - You know, I’m pretty sure we’re cursed. - Don’t say that.
Why? No, no, no, we are actually better off alone.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? No, no, estamos mejor solas.

translation.en: What if Mom didn't want to be alone?
translation.es: ¿Y si mamá no quiso estar sola?

translation.en: Dad made that decision for her.
Yeah.
What if he made a mistake?
Guys, can you give us a second?
Tight.
Whose address is this?
It's Dad's.
I asked Aunt Grace to help me find him.
translation.es: Le pedí ayuda a la tía Grace para encontrarlo.

translation.en: Just don’t tell Mom.
translation.es: Pero no se lo digas a mamá.

translation.en: Come on, say something.
- Why now? - Because what kind of bride
doesn’t have a father to walk her down the aisle?
translation.es: no tiene un padre que la lleve al altar?

translation.en: He left you before you took your first steps.
translation.es: Te abandonó antes de que dieras tu primer paso.

translation.en: - Okay, don’t you want to see him? - No! But actually, I...
I don’t care about people who abandon me.
translation.es: No me interesa alguien que me abandonó.

translation.en: Mom left me with Granny,
translation.es: Mamá me dejó con la abuela

translation.en: and you’ve seen what it’s like between me and her.
translation.es: y ya ves cómo es nuestra relación.

translation.en: It just feels like something's missing.
translation.es: Es que siento que falta algo.

translation.en: You’re about to cement yourself as Mommy's favorite daughter
translation.es: Estás a punto de consagrarte la hija favorita de mamá.

translation.en: and then marry the Black Prince Harry,
translation.es: Cásate con el príncipe Harry negro

translation.en: and I'm gonna say something nice about you publicly at your reception.
translation.es: y yo diré algo bueno de ti en público en la ceremonia.

translation.en: Do you really need more than that?
Wow, Beauty. I'm good, I'm done.
I can't.
Look, I can take you to Mauritius,
but in return you're gonna have to be my personal insta photographer.
translation.es: pero a cambio tendrás que ser mi fotógrafa personal de Instagram.

translation.en: Beauty is living in a fairytale,
translation.es: Beauty vive en un cuento de hadas.

translation.en: or doesn’t think.
I have an idea.
We can maybe meet up later, I'll cook you dinner,
translation.es: Podemos vernos más tarde, te cocinaré algo

translation.en: and you can use your sommelier skills to upgrade my wine collection.
translation.es: y con tus habilidades de sumiller, puedes mejorar mi bodega.

translation.en: That sounds great, right?
And we can talk about whatever’s going on between you and your sister.
translation.es: Y podemos hablar sobre lo que sea que pasa entre tú y tu hermana.

translation.en: I don’t want to talk.
Then I’ll help you with your speech.
translation.es: Entonces te ayudo con tu discurso.

translation.en: Look,
I’m glad that you called me.
translation.es: me alegra que me hayas llamado.

translation.en: And that things aren’t awkward between us after…
translation.es: Y que las cosas no están raras entre nosotros después de…

translation.en: everything that happened.
A free dinner sounds good.
Yeah!
But you have to pay me to help you with your wine collection.
translation.es: Pero debes pagar para que te ayude con los vinos.

translation.en: Oh, of course.
I’ll call you when I’m done.
Also, if you're gonna take me to Mauritius,
translation.es: Y… Si vas a llevarme a Mauricio, debes llevar un palo para selfies.

translation.en: you're gonna have to pack a selfie stick.
translation.es: Si vas a llevarme a Mauricio, debes llevar un palo para selfies.

translation.en: - What? - They want me to put up the tent.
You’re an engineering student.
Look at God!
I hope you're not taking the Lord's name in vain, Boitumelo?
translation.es: Espero que no estés usando el nombre de Dios en vano, Boitumelo.

translation.en: Just praising Him because He’s so good. Hallelujah.
translation.es: Solo lo estoy alabando, porque es bondadoso, ¡aleluya!

translation.en: Amen.
Ah, Boitumelo Sello!
Did you bring me nice alcohol from Cape Town?
translation.es: ¿Trajiste buen alcohol de Ciudad del Cabo?

translation.en: Hello, how are you?
How are you? I'm fine.
I'm kidding. You know,
you know I’ve got your back.
My uncle can drink anyone under the table
translation.es: Mi tío toma más que nadie

translation.en: and still be a fully functioning adult.
translation.es: y seguir actuando como un adulto.

translation.en: All of you, I don't want you drinking.
We need to concentrate and be focused.
Then you wonder why
- she doesn't come home. - Amen.
You too, Grace.
We need to prepare for tomorrow's gifting ceremony.
translation.es: Hay que prepararse para la entrega de regalos.

translation.en: Bokang. Why are you just standing there?
- Tumi. - Ma.
Where are the towels?
Oh, the towel sets for the gift giving ceremony tomorrow.
translation.es: Ah, sí, los juegos de toallas para la entrega de regalos mañana.

translation.en: At least they would have been if I had remembered to buy them.
translation.es: Las tendría si hubiera recordado comprarlas.

translation.en: Think it's best I bring them in the morning.
translation.es: Creo que es mejor si las traigo mañana.

translation.en: Just before the Twalas arrive.
translation.es: Antes de que lleguen los Twala.

translation.en: I want everything packed tonight!
I don't want Dineo saying I'm sabotaging her child's wedding.
translation.es: No quiero que Dineo diga que saboteo la boda de su hijo.

translation.en: - All right, let me-- - She's right.
Shadrack.
Make sure you fetch the meat.
Don't worry yourself, Dini. I will bring back the best meat.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Dini. ¡Traeré la mejor carne!

translation.en: Succulent! Top class.
With this rope.
An electric one?
And you Grace, you're cooking with me at the venue.
translation.es: Y tú, Grace, cocinarás conmigo en el salón.

translation.en: No, what's the point of doing it at a venue then?
It means there's already catering.
There's no need for us to cook.
Grace, the Twala's paid for everything,
but they can't pay for good food.
translation.es: Pero no pueden pagar por buena comida.

translation.en: Also, Grace makes the best potato salad.
translation.es: Además, Grace hace la mejor ensalada de papas.

translation.en: That's the only thing she can make.
translation.es: - Lo único que sabe preparar. - Dios santo.

translation.en: - Oh, my goodness. - Listen here.
translation.es: - Lo único que sabe preparar. - Dios santo. Oigan.

translation.en: I don't want any mistakes for the next three days. No mistakes.
translation.es: No quiero ningún tipo de error los próximos tres días. Ninguno.

translation.en: No drama. Do you hear me, Shadrack?
We're not you or your children, Dineo.
translation.es: Sí. - No somos ni tú ni tus hijos, Dineo. - ¡Hermana Moipone!

translation.en: Sister Moipone. What did you say about my kids?
translation.es: - No somos ni tú ni tus hijos, Dineo. - ¡Hermana Moipone! ¿Qué dijiste? ¿Qué dijiste de mis hijos?

translation.en: Please don't start with me.
- I'm asking you. - Wait a minute.
Let's go.
You must lock up Sister Moipone.
The key is on the table.
translation.es: La llave está en la mesa.

translation.en: - Okay, I'm coming. - Hurry up!
Mama won’t get it.
Who cares? Just come out to her.
translation.es: ¿Y qué? Es tu vida, díselo a ella.

translation.en: I'm not like you.
My mum actually likes me.
translation.es: Le caigo muy bien a mi madre.

translation.en: And Terrence? Is he going to actually like you,  once I phone him and uninvite him?
translation.es: ¿Y le caerás bien a Terrence cuando lo llame y le quite la invitación?

translation.en: Let's get a move on.
Your mum can't find us here.
translation.es: tu mamá no nos puede encontrar aquí.

translation.en: - Don't forget, we have a deal. - Okay.
translation.es: - No te olvides, tenemos un trato. - Bien.

translation.en: I'll help you with the towels,
and you call Terrence and tell him that he can't come to the wedding.
translation.es: y tú le dices a Terrence que no puede venir a la boda.

translation.en: Why did you invite him in the first place?
I didn't invite him!
He assumed he is invited.
translation.es: Dio por sentado que estaba invitado.

translation.en: Wait, you got a plus one? Okay.
Okay, you must distract her,
translation.es: Debes distraerla y tomo las toallas.

translation.en: - and I'll get the towels. Go in! -
Hi.
- Oh, Precious. Baby girl! - What's going on?
Baby girl. So you know there’s a wedding, right?
translation.es: Cariño, sabes que hay una boda, ¿no?

translation.en: But Grace, why are you chopping such big pieces?
translation.es: Pero, Grace, ¿por qué picas tan grande?

translation.en: This is the size you said you wanted.  I didn't say that.
translation.es: - Dijiste que los querías así. - No.

translation.en: Then you come and chop them.
This is why men leave you.
translation.es: Por eso te dejan los hombres.

translation.en: Oh! Where's your ring then?
Me? At least I had a ring on my finger before.
translation.es: ¿Yo? Al menos una vez tuve uno.

translation.en: You on the other hand…
Wow!
Mrs. Sello, as we discussed, you are welcome to cook here,
even though we do have a Michelin star chef.
translation.es: pero recuerde que tenemos un chef con estrellas Michelin.

translation.en: Can he make my mother’s mutton curry?
translation.es: ¿Sabe hacer el curry de carnero de mi madre?

translation.en: - Well, no, but-- - Then that's not good enough.
It’s just that we have an aesthetic here.
translation.es: Es solo que tenemos una cierta estética

translation.en: And that aesthetic does not include three- legged pots sitting outside for everyone to see.
translation.es: y esta no incluye tener ollas afuera a la vista de todos.

translation.en: Your aesthetic doesn’t accommodate Black people?
translation.es: ¿La estética no se amolda a los negros?

translation.en: Yes!
I mean...
No! I mean…
You know what?
The pots are fine. I love them.
translation.es: Las ollas están bien. Me encantan.

translation.en: So authentic!
Happy, happy cooking.
Oh, God.
I forget that you can be a boss sometimes.
translation.es: A veces olvido lo mandona que puedes ser.

translation.en: A Sello boss.
Please go back to work, the fun is over.
translation.es: Vuelve a trabajar, se acabó la diversión.

translation.en: - Sisters! Sisters! -
The meat has arrived.
- Shadrack. - Oh, my goodness, Shadrack!
- It's alive! - Don't worry, Dini.
I will slaughter it nicely.
Plus your mutton curry will be so tender.
translation.es: así tu curry sale bien tierno.

translation.en: It's an orphan. I got it for a discount.
translation.es: Es un huérfano, estaba de oferta.

translation.en: - Where's my change? - I had to get a truck.
translation.es: - ¿Y mi cambio? El cambio. - Tuve que usar un camión.

translation.en: What about your crappy car?
I didn't want to traumatize it. It's an orphan.  With that piece of junk.
translation.es: No quise traumatizarlo, un huérfano en esa basura.

translation.en: Did you spend my money on alcohol?
- Let me smell your breath. -
Again.
I think she said the kitchen is this way.
translation.es: Creo que dijo que la cocina era por aquí.

translation.en: - Kelebogile, come here. -
Hello, Valencia.
Dineo.
- This is Grace. - Yeah, Grace.
It looks like you need help in here.
Yes, you can help chop over there.
Dineo doesn’t need our help with preparing tomorrow’s lunch.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que Dineo no precisa nuestra ayuda para hacer el almuerzo.

translation.en: - Isn't that right, Dineo? - My team is ready.
Good for you.
You know having a personal chef has made me so lazy.
translation.es: Desde que tengo chef personal me puse muy perezosa.

translation.en: Nice life problems.
Oh, well.
What was that?
Family choir.
We'll leave you ladies to it.
See you tomorrow, Valencia.
Get that sheep out and make sure no one sees you, Shadrack.
translation.es: Llévate esa oveja y que nadie te vea, Shadrack.

translation.en: - Come help me, Grace. - I'll come help you, Brother.
Where are you going? You're not done cooking.
Grace, let's go!
My pots are burning.
- Shadrack! - Grace!
Hallelujah! We're about to die of hunger.
- Themba. - Okay.
Thank you, my boy.
Sbu, how did your wedding prep issues go?
translation.es: Sbu, ¿resolviste el problema de los preparativos?

translation.en: What wedding prep issues?
She's talking about
the one- on- one. The brotherly mentorship thing.
translation.es: De la charla uno a uno...

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yes.
Themba, you know that my ovulation window is small.
translation.es: Sabes que mi ovulación no dura mucho.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It’s these hormone injections that I'm taking.
translation.es: Son las inyecciones de hormonas que me estoy dando.

translation.en: Injections?
Yes, Grandma, so that she can fall pregnant.
Why don't you just screw? That's the way to get pregnant.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te la tiras y listo? Así se hace.

translation.en: Grandma, it's actually a long story.
Here’s to giving South Africa
an extravaganza that will trend for hours.
translation.es: un espectáculo que será trending topic por horas.

translation.en: I don't know why I agreed to a camera crew.
translation.es: No sé por qué accedí a que hubiera cámaras…

translation.en: Can’t it just be interviews?
Sbu, I didn’t pay all this money to book out The Four Seasons,
translation.es: Sbu, no gasté todo este dinero en el Four Seasons

translation.en: just so we could do more interviews.
Could you learn to just be a little grateful, my child?
translation.es: ¿Puedes ser un poco más agradecido, hijo?

translation.en: I mean, you sprung this on us so fast, Sbusiso.
translation.es: Nos trajiste todo esto tan de repente, Sbusiso.

translation.en: I understand. It's just that
I didn't want you guys to turn this into a political party conference.
translation.es: No quería que fuera una convención política.

translation.en: You see I just wanted something small. Nothing major.
translation.es: Quería algo pequeño. Nada demasiado grande.

translation.en: Sbusiso.
Look at Themba and Lydia. They had a big wedding
translation.es: Mira a Themba y Lydia. Su boda fue una muy grande.

translation.en: and look how happy they are.
translation.es: Y mira lo felices que son.

translation.en: But they are not screwing.
Aunt, here you go.
The towel sets are ready
for the Twala Aunties.
Ah, good girl!
Why did you bring them all the way here from the house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué las trajiste aquí desde la casa?

translation.en: If this girl winds up dead, just know I did it.
translation.es: Si esta chica termina muerta, sepan que fui yo.

translation.en: I've said this before,
I don’t want to be blamed for sabotaging  my sister's wedding.
translation.es: no quiero que me culpen por sabotear la boda de mi hermana.

translation.en: - Just give them to me and I'll put them-- - No, it's okay. I've got them.
translation.es: Puedes dármelas a mí y yo... - Ponlas en... - No, está bien. Me encargo yo.

translation.en: Give them to Thando. She knows where to put them.
translation.es: Dáselas a Thando. Ella sabe dónde van.

translation.en: Babe, sorry. Did you get these from the hotel?
translation.es: Cariño, lo siento… ¿Son estas toallas del hotel?

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a geniously bad idea.
translation.es: En retrospectiva, esta fue una idea muy mala.

translation.en: No.
No, but this is the hotel’s monogram.
translation.es: No, pero este es el logo del hotel.

translation.en: No, friend, maybe,
maybe the venue buys the towels from the same shop as her. Duh!
translation.es: Tal vez el hotel compra las toallas en el mismo lugar.

translation.en: Dear sweet Refiloe.
You were going to give my in- laws
stolen towels from the hotel they paid for?
translation.es: toallas robadas del hotel que ellos pagaron?

translation.en: Bokang, do you also steal now?
She did this all on her own.
translation.es: - Bokang, ¿acaso robas ahora? - ¿Yo? ¡Nunca! Ella hizo todo esto sola.

translation.en: No, I was going to go buy towels in the morning.
translation.es: No, iba a comprar toallas por la mañana.

translation.en: These are just, you know, for now.
Do you know what?
I have a friend who can help us by opening her shop early.
translation.es: Tengo una amiga que puede abrir su tienda mañana temprano.

translation.en: - She sells this type of stuff-- - Relax, okay?
- They’re just towels. - Yep.
These towels are for the welcoming ceremony.
translation.es: Estas toallas son parte de la ceremonia de bienvenida.

translation.en: At least I’m catching heat from my aunt and not my mother.
translation.es: Al menos estoy siendo atacada por mi tía y no mi madre.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Maybe you should hear this from your mother.
translation.es: Tal vez debas oír esto de boca de tu madre.

translation.en: Mama…
Grace,
do you see this sheep?
I gave it a name.
Her name is succulent.
Dineo is crazy. We are going to eat it.
translation.es: Dineo está loca. Vamos a comerla.

translation.en: Yes, we are going to eat it.
translation.es: Sí, nos la vamos a comer.

translation.en: She'll tell everybody it's the best mutton curry she's ever made.
translation.es: Le dirá a todos que es el mejor curry que haya hecho jamás.

translation.en: - You know her. - She's ridiculous.
translation.es: - Sí que la conoces. - Es ridícula.

translation.en: She and her sister, Moipone, are in the same WhatsApp group.
translation.es: Ella y su hermana Moipone están en el mismo grupo de WhatsApp.

translation.en: They talk too much.
Yes, all the time you just hear her shouting Grace!
Shadrack!
Grace! Shadrack!
Emergency!
You're all overreacting.
These are just towels!
Boitumelo, you like to provoke people.
translation.es: Boitumelo, a ti te gusta provocar a la gente.

translation.en: So the emergency is about towels?
With respect, I could list all your faults,
translation.es: Con todo respeto, podría enumerar todos tus errores,

translation.en: but we would be here for a while.
Don't talk to me like that.
What else must I do?
Tumi, my in- laws are going to hear you.
translation.es: Mis suegros te van a oír.

translation.en: That’s all you care about?
Yes, this is my wedding.
I don’t need this. You know, if I’m such a problem,
translation.es: No necesito esto. Si tanto molesto,

translation.en: - then have this wedding without me. - Ohh my goodness!
translation.es: hagan esta boda sin mí. Bathong.

translation.en: - Tumi. -
What's really going on?
So, seriously, the emergency was the towels?
translation.es: ¿De verdad que la emergencia eran las toallas?

translation.en: Sorry, Ma.
I hope you’re not on your way to see Sbusiso. It’s bad luck.
translation.es: Espero que no estés yendo a ver a Sbusiso. Da mala suerte.

translation.en: No… no, um…
the decorations…
You know, Mom, I'm so happy to be marrying Sbu.
translation.es: Sabes, mamá, estoy tan feliz de casarme con Sbu.

translation.en: Of course. You’ll never have to work again.
translation.es: Sí, no tendrás que volver a trabajar nunca más.

translation.en: Oh, I wasn’t talking about money.
Don’t pretend. It's just the two of us here.
translation.es: Estamos solas, no tienes que fingir.

translation.en: Go to bed, Beauty.
You don’t want those dark circles around your eyes tomorrow in your pictures, right?
You'll look ugly.
- Hi. - It's bad luck.
Okay, okay. What's wrong?
- Everyone’s ruining my wedding. - You want me to go deal with them?
translation.es: - Todos están arruinando la boda. - ¿Quieres que me ocupe?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah?
No.
It'll just make things worse.
- Let’s just go sign at Home Affairs. - No.
translation.es: Vamos a Asuntos Internos y listo. No.

translation.en: I’m not cancelling my dream wedding just because you’re cheap.
translation.es: No cancelaré la boda de mis sueños porque seas un tacaño.

translation.en: Cheap? Cheap?
- It's bad luck. - Okay, okay.
Do you know how much a London flat costs?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuánto cuesta un apartamento en Londres?

translation.en: And only God knows why you selected a two bedroom.
translation.es: Solo Dios sabe por qué escogiste uno de dos habitaciones.

translation.en: It's for our future babies.
Yeah, but we’re far away from that. I mean, thank God, right?
translation.es: Estamos lejos de eso, gracias a Dios.

translation.en: - What? - Nothing.
Can I get married without my mother and sister fighting?
translation.es: ¿Puedo casarme sin que mi madre y hermana se peleen?

translation.en: - Do you want us to wait for them to stop? - No.
translation.es: ¿Quieres esperar a que dejen de pelearse? No.

translation.en: The next available date for this venue is in 2022
translation.es: La próxima fecha disponible aquí es 2022.

translation.en: and that’s not enough time for those two.
Well, I think I know how to make you feel better.
translation.es: Pues, creo que sé cómo hacerte sentir mejor.

translation.en: - Come here. Come here. -
Come here.
- Not until after the wedding. - Shh.
No, baby. It's bad luck.
You sound like my mom.
- Nope. - I’m joking! I'm joking, it was a joke.
translation.es: - No. - Es una broma, fue una broma.

translation.en: Hey.
Hey.
What's up?
Where's your wife?  The wife is sleeping.
She's fast asleep.
I'm just feeling a bit restless,  you know. And you?
translation.es: Me siento un poco inquieto. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: I quit the wedding.
What?
- I didn’t know you could do that. - I'm the queen of the game.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No sabía que se podía. Soy la reina del juego.

translation.en: Look, I even stole their wine.
No, thank you.
Good choice.
This stuff tastes like pee.
Let me have a look.
I know this wine. This wine's supposed to be really good,
translation.es: Conozco este vino. Se supone que es bueno.

translation.en: but you're the expert.
Reputation doesn’t mean good taste.
You should take in the nose of the wine.
Tell me, what do you smell?
Alcohol?
- Oh! Zulu boys. - Whatever.
You should be able to scent it’s spices, you know,
and the wood from where the barrel's from.
translation.es: y la madera de donde es el barril.

translation.en: See, the scent of a wine can tell you its life story.
translation.es: El aroma del vino puede contarte su historia.

translation.en: But in your case, this one is free. So, have some.
translation.es: Pero en tu caso, este es gratis. Así que bebe.

translation.en: No, I'm fine. Thank you.
Oh, come on! It's one drink, it's not going to hurt you.
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Solo un trago. No te hará nada.

translation.en: I want to be clear- headed for tomorrow, I want to be focused.
translation.es: Quiero estar bien para mañana. Concentrado.

translation.en: - And so should you. - No, no, no!
See, I'm fine right here in wine land.
translation.es: Estoy bien en la tierra del vino.

translation.en: See, here I don’t feel so alone
and I'm not judged for every mistake that I make.
translation.es: Y nadie me juzga por los errores que cometo.

translation.en: Sounds nice.
Yeah, it is.
Just…
one night of being free.
And wine doesn't judge.
Take it.
- Take it. - You're annoying.
Okay.
Not to bad.
Wait, walk properly.
- I am walking properly. -
You're gonna burn out
All my love
- I feel so alive, man. - Yup.
I could do anything.
- I can do anything! - Themba, you're the man!
I've been watching you
Okay.
Let’s go swimming!
- Do you even know how to swim? - No!
Hey, where you at?
I thought we had plans.
I guess Beauty must be working you really hard, huh?
translation.es: Supongo que Beauty te estará explotando, ¿no?

translation.en: Call me when you get this.
They've taken my wife
translation.es: 23 DE DICIEMBRE DÍA DE LA BODA TRADICIONAL

translation.en: I’m sure Themba’s fine and there’s no need for this hullabaloo.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que Themba está bien. No hace falta armar tanto escándalo.

translation.en: He’s still not answering his phone.
- He must be somewhere around here. - I’m going to look for him.
translation.es: Debe de estar por aquí. Iré a buscarlo.

translation.en: Oh, no.
I'm not going to allow that child's paranoia to annoy our guests.
translation.es: No permitiré que la paranoia de esa niña moleste a los invitados.

translation.en: - Sbu. - Yes.
Which one do you think is gonna work better for the camera?
translation.es: ¿Cuál crees que queda mejor en cámara?

translation.en: Hello, may I please ask
- has anyone seen my husband around? - Any problem?
No. No problem.
What's going on?
Let me go and check.
Go, finish up. I'm just happy that this drama doesn't involve us
translation.es: No, termina eso, por suerte esto no nos incumbe

translation.en: and Shadrack got rid of the sheep.
translation.es: y Shadrack se deshizo de la oveja.

translation.en: - About that… - Uh- huh.
You and Shadrack.
Sister.
Don't leave me.
He wanted to slaughter it, but he was too drunk. I took him home,
translation.es: Quería matarla, sí. Pero estaba ebrio y lo llevé a su casa.

translation.en: but I couldn't load the sheep into the van on my own.
translation.es: Pero no pude subir la oveja a al auto yo sola.

translation.en: The two of you had one job and you failed.
translation.es: Tenían una sola tarea y no la cumplieron.

translation.en: - Oh, my goodness. - So where's the sheep?
It was tied here, Sister.
- Do you see a sheep here? - Oh, my goodness, Sister.
You see Candice and the Twalas.
They can't find it before we do.
There's the Twala family.
Let's go.
- Are you still looking for Themba? - Unfortunately so.
- Lydia, try calling him again. - Okay.
Let me go check that side.
Tumi? Why do you have Themba’s phone?
translation.es: Tumi, ¿por qué tienes el teléfono de Themba?

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
- It's just, um… -
- Tumi! - Where is my husband?
Why are his underpants floating in the pool?
translation.es: ¿Por qué está su ropa interior flotando en el agua?

translation.en: That’s not what it looks like. Um…
Was he drinking?
A shit load. A little.
- We have to call the police. - No, no, no.
translation.es: Hay que llamar a la policía.

translation.en: Boitumelo, what were you doing?
- What did you do? - We're not calling the police.
What if those media vultures find out? No police.
translation.es: ¿Y si los buitres de la prensa se enteran?

translation.en: - She's starting again. - Wait a minute. What's the fuss all about?
translation.es: Está empezando otra vez. Un momento. ¿Qué pasa aquí?

translation.en: Themba’s a recovering alcoholic.
Yo!
That explains a lot.
Yes and the last time Themba drank,
translation.es: Y la última vez que bebió

translation.en: he ended up in Mozambique without a passport.
He caused me a diplomatic incident of note and tainted my image.
translation.es: Causó un problema diplomático y perjudicó mi imagen.

translation.en: We’ll find him before he gets to Mozambique.
translation.es: Lo encontraremos antes de que llegue a Mozambique.

translation.en: Look. What's this?
What is this?
I'm going to kill you!
- No, no, no. - No, wait! Wait!
Just jump! Come here!
- How? - Come here.
- - Please!
Get out of my way.
- This wedding is off. - Huh- uh, Mum--
- Peasant! - Val… Valencia.
Tumi, what’s going on?
I told you it wasn’t what it looked like.
translation.es: Les dije que no era lo que parecía.

translation.en: Tumi!
- It's worse. -
